locale.message: This harvester supports the Open Archives Initiative (OAI) protocol, versions 1.1 and 2.0.
Click Refresh to update supported formats list for this archive.
This form will be automatically populated with values fetched from the OAI repository's metadata. Current field values will be replaced. Are you sure you wish to continue?
The OAI URL field is required.
The specified OAI URL is not valid. Please check the URL and try again.
The specified OAI URL is already in use by another archive.
The administrator email address you supplied is not valid.
This is an OAI Static Repository
The indexing method field is required.
The metadata format field is required.
An unknown header tag was received from the server: {$tag}

The following additional flags are available for the OAI Harvester: skipExistingEntries: When set, existing records will not be updated from=YYYY-MM-DD: Harvest records at least as new as the specified date (use "now" for current date, "last" for date of last harvest) until=YYYY-MM-DD: Harvest records at least as old as the specified date (use "now" for current date) set=setSpec: Harvest records from the specified set (may be specified multiple times) useLastSets: Harvest using the list of sets used during the last harvest
